text: 10.19: Lo 32.21; Ro 11.11; Ta 3.3Gu vhɨra harigi nzambareŋ khar ki. Ee, mbe Isreriŋ, mbe kha buna nɨɨeŋ kaŋgi fhuve? Fhuvara. Mbe ne kaŋgi. Nde fharav Moses Fhe Bakɨme ga nzuav suaŋgi kameŋ ndɨrɨgɨri. Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ suaŋgi, “Gu nde Isreriŋ, gu nden muuŋgirim, nde zɨ ki fhuv fhain ki ŋguia, nde mbe suaŋv ndavi shirga. Gu nden muuŋgirim, nde ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ki fhu fhain ki ŋguia, nde mbe vhegɨrga.”
